robot.sensors

Class ColorGather

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.sensors.ColorGather

  • public class ColorGather
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes in data from the three color sensor on the robot. One on the front. Two on the bottom. Also determines whether or not a sensor is on a gridline.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Andreas
